casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED and Stafford Land Company, Inc.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE. No. 315PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. James E. Scarbrough, Concord, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. James R. Demay, Concord, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Raleigh, for Town of Carthage. Jennifer Welch, Raleigh. James M. Carpenter, General Counsel, for N.C. Home Builders Association, Inc. John T. Benjamin, Jr., Raleigh, for Leading Builders of America. William E. Hubbard, Raleigh, for Leading Builders of America.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th of September 2015 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
